TopicTitle: Electric charge should have a cash value

Articles.Content:
Maybe an extremely tiny one, so if you generate thousands of units it could get you a tiny bit of extra cash? Small values make it less exploitable, maybe.

Just a way to avoid bankruptcy.

Once again, timewarp comes into play here. I could timewarp, leave for the day, and then come back home and be swimming in Funds without ever doing anything. And I think that bankruptcy should be possible in KSP - Squad wanted to make it tycoon-y, right?

There should be some kind of yearly costs to prevent excessive timewarping.

It is already effectively impossible to go bankrupt, because of the front payment contracts give, combined with the extremely long contract duration.

If you're still short of cash, you need to rethink the way you build your rockets
